item.title: Video Content Creator for Family Organization App - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled content creator to join our team and help create engaging and informative content for our app designed to simplify life organization for families. As a content creator, you will be responsible for creating video content, possibly researching and generating ideas for blog articles, social media posts, and in-app content that resonates with our target audience. Your content should be tailored to the needs of busy families.  Experience in family organization or related topics is a plus.

Skills required:
-Video content creation
-Video editing skills
- Strong research abilities
- Ability to adapt writing style to different platforms
- Knowledge of family organization and productivity tools

This is a medium-sized project with a duration of 1 to 3 months, starting as soon as possible. We are looking for an intermediate-level content creator who can deliver high-quality content on a consistent basis.

Budget: $200
Posted On: June 24, 2024 10:28 UTC
Category: Creative Writing
Skills:Graphic Design, Content Writing, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator
Skills: Graphic Design, Content Writing, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
